entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then steady. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries this morning. Clearing this afternoon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this morning. Temperature falling to minus 20 this morning then steady. Wind chill minus 30 this morning and minus 23 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 08:17 AM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
